dialogue.headline:
The script of our era has been shattered, and the once-unified melody now falls apart.
In this age of chaos, can we rediscover balance together?
dialogue.paragraph1: Standing in 2026, as students and practitioners of information technology, we find ourselves at the forefront of a transformative era. The rise of AI challenges traditional development paradigms, and the technical barriers that once defined our value are gradually eroding. As the power of creation becomes democratized and individual technical prowess can no longer serve as a moat, "collaboration" emerges as our most critical challenge. We are heading into a grand chaos that seeks balance between AI, peers, and cross-disciplinary partners. But what if disorder is not an obstacle, but the starting point of a new equilibrium?
dialogue.paragraph2: In an improvised music jam session, there is no conductor. When the beats don‚Äôt align, we create a new rhythm together. When the harmony is imperfect, that imperfection becomes the voice of our generation‚Äîinclusive, bold, unrestrained, and diverse. At SITCON 2026, we invite you to join this jam. Let us navigate chaos, find rhythm amid disorder, and seek resonance through collaboration.
dialogue.paragraph3: The Students‚Äô Information Technology Conference (SITCON), founded in 2012, is a student-centered, student-initiated conference. It has long been dedicated to advancing student IT education and promoting open-source culture. SITCON aims to guide more students into the world of information technology, while also bringing together all students interested in IT to exchange ideas, pass on knowledge, and inspire one another‚Äîrealizing the spirit of learning by doing and teaching through sharing.

activities.title: Keynote
activities.body: This session takes you straight to the heart of this year‚Äôs conference theme! We‚Äôve invited a speaker to break down the key ideas behind the theme in a clear and accessible way. Through the speaker‚Äôs perspective, you‚Äôll not only understand what SITCON wants to convey this year, but also follow the rhythm of the talk to brainstorm around interesting ideas and uncover deeper insights together!

activities.title: Panel
activities.body: This is a deep and engaging discussion featuring one moderator and three panelists! Guided by the moderator‚Äôs thoughtful facilitation, guests from diverse backgrounds will explore this year‚Äôs theme from different angles. You‚Äôll hear multiple perspectives collide on stage, helping you step outside the box, re-examine the core topics from new viewpoints, and piece together a broader and richer technical vision through shared experiences.

activities.title: Sessions
activities.body: Here you‚Äôll find a collection of excellent talks submitted by students from all over! Whether you prefer in-depth Presentations that thoroughly unpack technical concepts, or fast-paced Espresso sessions that deliver key takeaways in a short time, there‚Äôs plenty to discover. On top of that, there are flexible open-format sessions where ideas from different backgrounds can freely interweave. Come experience the hands-on knowledge and creativity brought by student speakers on-site!

activities.title: Demo Showcase
activities.body:
Building on last year‚Äôs enthusiastic response, the Demo Showcase returns with an exciting upgrade! This special exhibition area goes beyond the regular program, providing a stage for students to present their projects and researchÊàêÊûú through live demos and conversations. It‚Äôs a great opportunity for attendees to explore diverse topics in a relaxed way and spark new inspiration.

The showcase will take place on March 28, 2026 (conference day), at the booths on the north side of the 4th floor, featuring outstanding student work from across Taiwan. Whether you‚Äôre interested in technical innovation, project sharing, interactive design, or cutting-edge research discoveries, you‚Äôre sure to find topics that surprise and inspire you.

In addition, project exhibitors will be present at different time slots to chat and discuss with attendees. This is a perfect chance to ask questions, learn, and meet amazing peers from around the country‚Äîif you love exploring new knowledge, don‚Äôt miss it!

sections.title: First Time Here & Want to Make Friends

activities.title: Compass Project
activities.body:
Looking forward to meeting like-minded partners at the conference? We sincerely invite you to join the Compass Project!

The Compass Project provides an opportunity for exchange, aiming to help you find partners with shared interests to explore topics together. Whether you are an experienced veteran or a curious newcomer, you can find resonance here.

Based on the information you provide, we will match you with suitable partners to form groups and encourage active interaction. To ensure a good experience for everyone, please stay in touch and engage with your group members after signing up, so that every participant expecting interaction can truly meet others. During the conference, you can participate in various activities with your group members or have a relaxed meetup during lunch. Whether sharing experiences, exchanging viewpoints, or discussing conference agenda topics, it will be a rewarding experience.

Everyone, regardless of their level of expertise, can find their place here and work together to create an open environment for mutual exchange and learning. We look forward to your enthusiastic participation, making SITCON 2026 even more wonderful!

activities.title: Guided Tours
activities.body:
Facing a chaotic scene with intertwined melodies of crowds, perhaps you are still lost. The laughter in the venue is like scattered notes with unset beats. What are you waiting for? Join the Guided Tour! Let the conductors lead you through the unknown of SITCON to find your own melody and belonging. You can find guides holding SITCON flags at the meeting point. Follow the SITCON guides to visit community booths and the poster exhibition, helping you understand the various aspects and operations of SITCON. There are two tours in the morning and two in the afternoon, each lasting about 40 minutes. Details will be announced later.

sections.title: Want to Play Something at the Venue

activities.title: Reality Game
activities.body: Don't know what to do between sessions? Want to interact with booths but don't know how to start? Don't worry! Open OPass and join the Reality Game! This year's Reality Game combines the SITCON 2026 theme 'Jam the Chaos'. In the game, you will unlock levels, challenge memory sequence games, master the rhythm, solve puzzles, accumulate completions, and climb the leaderboard for a chance to win coupons for the SITCON 2026 souvenir booth! „ÄêHow to Unlock New Levels?„Äë ü§ù Interact with Sponsors: Communicate with sponsors to unlock new levels, verify higher difficulty challenges, and sprint up the leaderboard! üé§ Join Activities & Explore Venue: Explore the venue, check in at activity locations, and participate in exciting events. Each activity and new location unlocks a new level~ üîç Meet New Friends: Interact with other attendees; every new encounter unlocks a new level. The more levels you complete and the higher you rank, the greater your chances of winning! Pick up your phone and groove with the rhythm!

activities.title: Whiteboard War
activities.body:
In this era of intertwined viewpoints and infinite creativity, pick up a whiteboard marker, add your thoughts to this chaotic world, and start a wonderful battle of ideas!

We sincerely invite you to the whiteboard area on the 3rd floor to join this smokeless 'Whiteboard War'. Jam the code together, debate and defend the sect you believe in (x). This will be a grand platform for you to showcase creativity and clash viewpoints.

In a relaxed atmosphere, let's use whiteboards as weapons, unleash infinite creativity, challenge different viewpoints, and create more sparks! Come and splash your ideas to make this whiteboard world even more chaotic!

activities.title: Lightning Talks
activities.body:
Do you have something exciting to share but missed the submission deadline? Welcome to participate in SITCON 2026 Lightning Talks! Lightning Talks provide eight slots for the quickest attendees to share their projects or ideas in five minutes!

On the day of the conference from 10:00 AM to 3:30 PM, you are welcome to submit your proposal at the designated whiteboard area. The submission method is simple! Once submission opens, choose an empty slot on the whiteboard and write down your talk title and name (e.g., 'How I Became the Wind by Windful'). There are only eight slots, and each person is limited to one submission, so be quick! After submitting, please scan the form next to the whiteboard to provide more information, such as title, speaker name, and outline. We suggest preparing this content in advance to ensure a smooth process!

If you successfully become a speaker, please gather at the right side of R0 on the 3rd floor at 4:40 PM sharp with your presentation equipment. Agenda team members will be there to assist you. To maintain diversity and fun, we do not accept overly commercial submissions. If your talk exceeds the time limit or contains commercial content for more than ten seconds, the screen will be cut off directly!

We invite you to this adrenaline-pumping activity to communicate and share with more people at SITCON!

general.name: General Coordinator Team
general.description: The core team coordinating the entire conference, responsible for orchestrating operations across all teams and defining the conference's direction and policies. We are the navigators, ensuring the event runs smoothly and achieves its goals.

administration.name: Administration Team
administration.description: Handles all administrative affairs, including documentation, meeting minutes, and internal communication. We are the lubricant of the team, ensuring smooth processes.

agenda.name: Agenda Team
agenda.description: Responsible for agenda planning and speaker invitations, the core content producers of the conference. We review a large number of technical submissions and select the most suitable topics to ensuring attendees hear high-quality content.

operations.name: Operations Team
operations.description: The guardians of the venue on the day of the conference, responsible for flow planning, equipment setup, and handling emergencies. We are the unsung heroes behind the smooth running of the event, requiring strong adaptability to face various challenges.

design.name: Design Team
design.description: Responsible for the key visual and merchandise design, depicting SITCON with colors and lines. We pursue visual excellence, striving to visualize abstract concepts and bring everyone a perfect visual feast.

finance.name: Finance Team
finance.description: Controls the financial power of the conference, ensuring every penny of sponsorship and budget is used effectively. We need meticulousness and patience to handle complex accounting and budgeting, serving as the solid backing for the event.

recording.name: Photography Team
recording.description: Captures every wonderful moment of the conference promoting event photography and video recording. We are the guardians of memories, preserving every touching moment forever.

production.name: Production Team
production.description: Responsible for audio-visual equipment and live streaming systems, ensuring agendas are presented smoothly to all participants. We are the combination of technology and art, allowing every speech to be perfectly conveyed.

development.name: Development Team
development.description: Dedicated to building the digital foundation of the conference with code, maintaining the stable operation of the official website and App. We are a group of developers who love technology, transforming imaginative designs into actual interactive experiences. Welcome to exchange and learn here!

editorial.name: Editorial Team
editorial.description: Responsible for the production and proofreading of all text content, including website copy, promotional materials, and press releases. We convey the spirit of SITCON through words, ensuring every message accurately reaches the target audience.

marketing.name: Marketing Team
marketing.description: Responsible for external promotion and community management, letting more people know about SITCON through various channels. We are the spokespersons of the conference, promoting the event to the world with creativity and passion.
